movies.title: Women’s World
movies.description: Activist Sheryl Kurland gifted domestic violence victims with new lipsticks and their moods suddenly shifted, one hundred thousand lipstick donations later, Kurland is far from finished

movies.title: The Beachball
movies.description: The principle of the beachball tells us to hold the space for all perspectives. No one can see an entire beachball from one perspective. It's impossible.

movies.title: The Life Quotes
movies.description: These quotes cover a range of perspectives on life, from finding happiness and purpose to embracing challenges and creating your own path.

movies.title: Black Friday Super
movies.description: Get ready for the ultimate shopping extravaganza! This Black Friday, unleash the savings and grab unbeatable deals. Don't miss out on the super savings spree of the year!

movies.title: The Hikaru Night
movies.description: In a small, forgotten town, the night of the Hikaru festival brings with it an ancient legend. As the moon rises, a group of friends stumbles upon a hidden world of magic and mystery.

movies.title: The Easy Reach
movies.description: Introducing 'The Easy Reach' – the ultimate solution for effortless accessibility. Whether you’re organizing your home, office, or workspace, our innovative design ensures everything you need is always within easy reach.
